00029 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00030 //
00031 // UsimPbHandler
00032 //
00034 
00035 class UsimPbHandler 
00036 {
00037     public:
00038         // maximum supported number of records in GAS and AAS
00039         enum {
00040             c_max_supported_gas_recs = 20,
00041             c_max_supported_aas_recs = 20,
00042         };
00043         
00044         // GAS WString buffer, no dyn array used because of overhead
00045         struct GasArray {
00046             WString m_wstr[c_max_supported_gas_recs];
00047         };
00048         // AAS WString buffer, no dyn array used because of overhead
00049         struct AasArray {
00050             WString m_wstr[c_max_supported_aas_recs];
00051         };
00052 
00053         // constructor & desctructor
00054         UsimPbHandler();
00055         virtual ~UsimPbHandler();
00056 
00057         // pointer initializing
00058         void Init(UsimPbAccessor * accessor);
00059         // is access to the USIM phoenbook allowed
00060         BOOLEAN IsUsimAccessAllowed() { 
00061             return UsimPbAccessor::IsUsimAccessAllowed(); 
00062         }
00063 
00064         // resets the data structure and clears all buffers including structure data of accessor
00065         void Reset();
00066         // clears the cached data
00067         void ClearCachedData();
00068 
00069         //
00070         UsimPbAccessor * GetUsimPbAccessor() { ASSERT_DEBUG(m_pb_accessor!=0); return m_pb_accessor; }
00071         //
00072         UsimPbEntryCont * GetUsimPbEntryCont() { ASSERT_DEBUG(m_container!=0); return m_container; }
00073 
00074 
00075     // GAS and AAS handling
00076         // returns the number of GAS or AAS records
00077         UINT GetXasCount(UsimPbAddType type) const;
00078         // returns the records size of GAS or AAS records
00079         UINT GetXasSize(UsimPbAddType type) const;
00080         // returns the filehandle
00081         INT GetXasHandle(UsimPbAddType type) const;
00082 
00083         // loads the GAS or AAS records into cache
00084         BOOLEAN RetrieveXas(UsimPbAddType type);
00085         // returns a GAS or AAS string to caller
00086         BOOLEAN GetXasRecord(UsimPbAddType type, UINT recno, WString & name) const;
00087         // updates GAS or AAS string on USIM and cache
00088         BOOLEAN UpdateXasRecord(UsimPbAddType type, UINT recno, const WString & name);
00089 
00090     // phonebook handling
00091         // selects the phonebook
00092         BOOLEAN SelectPhonebook(UsimPbLocation location);
00093         // initializes the phonebook
00094         BOOLEAN InitializePhonebook();
00095         // deselects the phonebook
00096         BOOLEAN DeselectPhonebook();
00097 
00098         // called from ASC to indicate that startup is now finished
00099         void StartupFinished(UsimPbResult result);
00100         // post the usim ready message (defined in ASC) 
00101         void PostUsimPbReadyMsg();
00102 
00103         // returns the maximúm number of ADN records
00104         INT GetMaxCount();
00105         // get the number of existing records
00106         INT GetExistingCount();
00107         // get the next free position
00108         INT GetNextFreePosition();
00109         // returns the tag size dependend of the record position
00110         INT GetTagSize(UINT simpos);
00111         // returns the alpha tag size dependned of the record poistion
00112         INT GetAlphaTagSize(UINT simpos);
00113         // loads all entries from the phonebook
00114         BOOLEAN LoadAllEntries(Provider * parentprov, ProviderListener * listener = 0);
00115         // refreshing
00116         BOOLEAN RefreshData(INT recno);
00117         void Refresh();
00118         // delete all entries
00119         BOOLEAN DeleteEntries(ProviderListener * listener = 0);
00120         // updates an entry
00121         BOOLEAN UpdateEntry(INT recno, const WString & name, const PhoneNumber & bcdnr, INT & newrow);
00122         // deletes an entry
00123         BOOLEAN DeleteEntry(INT recno);
00124         // get progress
00125         INT GetProgress() const { return m_progress; }
00126         // get one entry from the container, whereas recno is the position inside container
00127         UsimPbEntry * GetEntry(INT recno);
00128         // get the group value if available of a phonebook entry
00129         BOOLEAN GetGroup(UINT simpos, UINT idx, UINT8 & group);
00130         // set the hidden info value of a phonebook entry
00131         BOOLEAN UpdateHiddenInfo(UINT simpos, UINT8 hiddeninfo);
00132         // set the group values of a phonebook entry
00133         BOOLEAN UpdateGroups(UINT simpos, const UsimPbGroups & groups);
00134         // set the anr values of a phonebook entry
00135         BOOLEAN UpdateAnr(UINT simpos, const PhoneNumberCommitArray & anr, const Uint8CommitArray & aas);
00136         // set the sne or email values of a phonebook entry
00137         BOOLEAN UpdateRefType(UsimPbRefType type, UINT simpos, const WStringCommitArray & email);
00138         // push/refreshes an entry which comes from APC
00139         BOOLEAN PushUsimPbEntry(const UsimPbReadAsyncIndArg & arg);
00140         // refresh an data XAS entry which comes from APC
00141         BOOLEAN RefreshUsimPbDataEntry(const UsimPbReadDataAsyncIndArg & arg);
00142         // refresh reference datas which comes direct from APC
00143         BOOLEAN RefreshUsimPbRefEntry(const UsimPbReadRefAsyncIndArg & arg);
00144 
00145     private:
00146         UsimPbResult LoadContainerEntry(INT recno);
00147         UsimPbResult LoadContainerRefEntries(INT recno, const UsimPbRefRecord & refrecord);
00148 
00149         void ClearRwBuffer(INT length);
00150 
00151         // buffers of GAS and AAS strings
00152         GasArray m_gas_entries;
00153         AasArray m_aas_entries;
00154         // states if GAS and AAS have been updated
00155         BOOLEAN     m_gas_isupdated;
00156         BOOLEAN     m_aas_isupdated;
00157 
00158         INT                 m_progress;
00159         UsimPbEntryCont *   m_container;
00160         UsimPbAccessor *    m_pb_accessor;
00161         BOOLEAN             m_pbinfo_initialized;
00162         UINT8 *             m_rwbuffer;
00163         INT                 m_rwbuffer_maxlength;
00164 
00165         BOOLEAN             m_refentry_loading;
00166         UsimPbResult        m_startup_result;
00167 
00168 };
